title: What’s it like to report on a closed-doors Grand Prix?
description: Chris Medland joins the ESPN F1 Podcast to report back on the “new normal” at the first two races and look ahead to the Hungarian Grand Prix, including some of your wild predictions and questions in the Pit Stop.
itunes:author: ESPN, Alexis Nunes, Laurence Edmondson, Nate Saunders
itunes:subtitle: Chris Medland joins the ESPN F1 Podcast to report back on the “new normal” at the first two races and look ahead to the Hungarian Grand Prix, including some of your wild predictions in the Pit Stop.
